replies.text: Alright, I will send this to {UserName}.
replies.speak: Alright, I will send this to {UserName}.

replies.text: What is the subject of the email?
replies.speak: What is the subject of the email?

replies.text: What do you want to add as the message?
replies.speak: What do you want to add as the message?

replies.text: Including a subject is often appreciated by contacts. Want to add a subject?
replies.speak: Including a subject is often appreciated by contacts. Want to add a subject?

replies.text: I will playback the message for you to confirm:
replies.speak: I will playback the message for you to confirm: {EmailContent}

replies.text: Do you want to include this in the email?
replies.speak: Do you want to include this in the email?

replies.text: Got it, this email will not be sent yet.
replies.speak: Got it, this email will not be sent yet.

replies.text: Would you like to adjust the Participants, Subject or the Content?
replies.speak: Would you like to adjust the Participants, Subject or the Content?

replies.text: You can try Participants, Subject, or Content. Or say cancel.
replies.speak: You can try Participants, Subject, or Content. Or say cancel.
